## serializeFlowContentToText() function

Serializes the specified flow content to plain text

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function serializeFlowContentToText(content: FlowContent, options?: Partial<FlowContentTextOptions>): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  content | [FlowContent](./scribing.flowcontent.md) | The flow content that shall be serialized |
|  options | Partial&lt;[FlowContentTextOptions](./scribing.flowcontenttextoptions.md)<!-- -->&gt; | _(Optional)_ Optional. Options for controlling text serialization. |

**Returns:**

string

The serialized plain text string
